nodes.text: The Raventhorn plant was a plant native to the Forest moon of Endor. It had red petals and thorns. It could be found in many rocky mountainous region of Endor.

Raventhorn plants can be found on the slopes of various mountains in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. The plant's name was revealed by a painting that can be acquired in the game called "Painting of a Raventhorn Plant".
